Interface OutputTarget

public interface OutputTarget
Target of writable, binary output data.

Note that openStream() and openChannel() represent different access methods, hence only one of these are to be used at a time.

Since:
2025-07-01
Author:
Morten Sabroe Mortensen

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    WritableByteChannel
    openChannel()
    Creates a new channel to read data.
    OutputStream
    openStream()
    Creates a new stream to read data.

  • Method Details

    • openStream

      OutputStream openStream() throws IOException
      Creates a new stream to read data.
      Returns:
      Stream to read data.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown in case of I/O error.

    • openChannel

      WritableByteChannel openChannel() throws IOException
      Creates a new channel to read data.
      Returns:
      Channel to read data.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown in case of I/O error.
